metadata.title: SUSE-RU-2013:1209-1 -- Recommended update for yast2-mail
metadata.description:
This update fixes the following issues:
* ag_postfix_mastercf process freezed the system, when saving mail server settings with the YaST2 "Mail Server" module (bnc#800788) * AutoYaST configuration of mail services failed (bnc#822285) * automatic installation stopped with error during Postfix configuration (bnc#821632) * YaST2 mail server enhanced module was not able to detect mail domains (bnc#818544)
